revisions.rev:
{{Infobox software | name = Foxit Reader | title = Foxit Reader | logo = [[File:Foxitreader.png|64px|Foxit Reader]] | screenshot = [[File:Foxit.png|250px]] | caption = Foxit Reader under [[Windows 7]] Home premium | collapsible = | author = | developer = [[Foxit|Foxit Corporation]] | released = | discontinued = | frequently updated = yes | programming language = | operating system = [[Microsoft Windows]] [[Windows 2000|2000]] or higher, [[Linux|GNU/Linux]] | platform = [[Desktop computer]], [[Mobile device|Mobile Devices]] | size = 7.56 [[Megabyte|MB]] - Windows
3.61 MB - GNU/Linux | language = [[Multilingualism|Multilingual]] | status = Active | genre = [[List of PDF software#Viewers|PDF Viewer / Reader]] | license = [[Proprietary software|Proprietary]][http://www.foxitsoftware.com/pdf/rd_eula.htm Foxit Reader End User License Agreement] / [[Freeware]] | website = [http://www.foxitsoftware.com/ www.foxitsoftware.com/] }} '''Foxit Reader''' is a multilingual [[Portable Document Format|PDF]] reader. Both the basic and full version readers can be downloaded for free. Foxit Reader is notable for its short load time and small filesize, and has been compared favorably to [[Adobe Reader]].{{cite web|url=http://www.pcworld.com/downloads/file/fid,62648-order,1-page,1-c,alldownloads/description.html |title=PC World, Foxit (PDF) Reader review |publisher=Pcworld.com |date= |accessdate=2010-05-12}}{{cite web|author=by ailingdogman on May 11, 2010 |url=http://download.cnet.com/Foxit-Reader/3000-10743_4-10313206.html |title=cnet download.com Foxit Reader 3.0 build 1506 review |publisher=Download.cnet.com |date= |accessdate=2010-05-12}} The MS Windows version allows annotating and saving unfinished PDF forms, [[Portable Document Format#Interactive elements|FDF]] import/export, converting to text, highlighting and drawing. ==Versions== ===Windows version=== Foxit Reader v3.x is available for 32-bit and 64-bit [[Microsoft Windows]] 2000 through [[Windows 7|7]],{{cite web|url=http://www.foxitsoftware.com/downloads/ |title=www.foxitsoftware.com/pdf/reader/download.php |title=Foxit Software - Downloads(Latest Version)|publisher=Foxitsoftware.com |date=2009-11-26 |accessdate=2010-05-12}} Windows Mobile 2003 and 5.0, and Windows CE 4.2 and 5.0. It allows Windows 98/ME to open Acrobat version 7 and 8 files, which the current version of Adobeâs Acrobat reader for those operating systems will not. It also supports the [[U3]] smart drive when used with Windows 2000 or Windows XP. Foxit Reader 2.0 is the last version which runs on Windows 95, Windows NT 4.0, Windows 98, and Windows Me. Since version 3.0 Foxit Reader for Windows requires Windows 2000/XP/2003/Vista/7.{{cite web|url=http://www.foxitsoftware.com/pdf/reader/download.php |title=Foxit Reader website |publisher=Foxitsoftware.com |date=2009-11-26 |accessdate=2010-05-12}} ===Linux version=== Foxit Software has released a [[Linux|GNU/Linux]] version of Foxit Reader available for download in three formats; namely [[deb (file format)|.deb]] for [[List of Linux distributions#Debian-based|Debian-based distributions]], like [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]], [[RPM Package Manager|.rpm]] for [[List of Linux distributions#RPM-based|RPM-based distributions]], and a pre-compiled binary package in a [[tar (file format)#Compression and naming|tar.gz]] file.{{cite web|url=http://www.foxitsoftware.com/pdf/desklinux/download.html |title=Foxit Reader for desktop Linux - Download page |publisher=Foxitsoftware.com |date= |accessdate=2010-05-12}} On August 13, 2009, Foxit Reader version 1.1 was released for GNU/Linux. Foxit Reader for desktop GNU/Linux does not support a few features which are available on MS Windows versions such as commenting tools, form filling and saving support, FDF support, drawing markup tools, as well as typewriter. Foxit Corporation stated that it will be improving the GNU/Linux version with more functions and release a new development plan of Foxit Reader v1.2 for Desktop GNU/Linux in December, 2009.{{cite web|url=http://www.foxitsoftware.com/pdf/desklinux/index.html |title=Foxit Reader for desktop Linux |publisher=Foxitsoftware.com |date= |accessdate=2010-05-12}} ==See also== *[[List of PDF software]] *[[Adobe Acrobat|Adobe Reader]] ==References== {{Reflist}} == External links == * [http://www.foxitsoftware.com/Secure_PDF_Reader/ Foxit Reader official webpage] {{PDF readers}} [[Category:Windows software]] [[Category:Technical communication tools]] [[Category:PDF software]] [[Category:PDF readers]] [[Category:Freeware]] [[Category:Portable software]] [[ca:Foxit Reader]] [[cs:Foxit Reader]] [[de:Foxit Reader]] [[es:Foxit Reader]] [[fa:ÙØ§Ú©Ø³ÛØª Ø±ÛØ¯Ø±]] [[fr:Foxit Reader]] [[ko:í­ì¤ì ë¦¬ë]] [[hi:à¤«à¥à¤à¥à¤¸à¤¿à¤ à¤°à¥à¤¡à¤°]] [[it:Foxit Reader]] [[nl:Foxit Reader]] [[ja:Foxit Reader]] [[oc:Foxit Reader]] [[pl:Foxit PDF Reader]] [[pt:Foxit Reader]] [[ru:Foxit Reader]] [[fi:Foxit Reader]] [[sv:Foxit Reader]] [[uk:Foxit Reader]] [[vi:Foxit Reader]] [[zh:ç¦æéè¯»å¨]]
